parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Hostname
parameter.description: Hostname or IP address of the FENECON device, e.g. 192.168.1.11

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: Password to access the device. The password for guest access is set by default.

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: Interval the device is polled in sec.

channel-type.label: System State
channel-type.description: FENECON system state: Ok, Info, Warning or Fault

channel-type.label: Last Update
channel-type.description: Last successful update via REST-API from the FENECON system

channel-type.label: Battery State
channel-type.description: Battery state of charge in percent

channel-type.label: Charger Power
channel-type.description: Current charger power of energy storage system in watt.

channel-type.label: Discharger Power
channel-type.description: Current discharger power of energy storage system in watt.

channel-type.label: Emergency Power Mode
channel-type.description: Indicates if there is grid power is off and the emergency power mode is on.

channel-type.label: Producer Power
channel-type.description: Current active power producer load in watt.

channel-type.label: Sell Grid Power
channel-type.description: Current sell to grid exchange power in watt.

channel-type.label: Sell Grid Energy
channel-type.description: Total energy exported to the grid in watt per hour.

channel-type.label: Consumer Power
channel-type.description: Current active power consumer load in watt.

channel-type.label: Buy Grid Power
channel-type.description: Current buy from grid exchange power in watt.

channel-type.label: Buy Grid Energy
channel-type.description: Total energy imported from the grid in watt per hour.
